name: Ace Attorney: Turnabout Of A Legend
summary: Apollo returns from his trials abroad to attend Chief Prosecutor Edgeworth's 5 Year anniversary project. Only to find his mentor, and dear friend Phoenix Wright murdered. With an old co-worker and friend accused, it is up to Apollo to prove her innocence, and find Phoenix's true killer! Investigate the crime, while uncovering more of the corruption ring at the Prosecutor's Office.
